name: php-mock/php-mock
description: PHP-Mock can mock built-in PHP functions (e.g. time()). PHP-Mock relies on PHP's namespace fallback policy. No further extension is needed.

suggest.php-mock/php-mock-phpunit: Allows integration into PHPUnit testcase with the trait PHPMock.
suggest.php-mock/php-mock-mockery: Allows using PHPMockery for Mockery integration
